title: Replay does not let me hear abilities or auto attacks
body:
I can hear champion voices, announcer, and summoner spells, but any ability or auto attack is missing from the game :/
I tried resetting the sound options but nothing helps.

replies.body:
That's a peculiar issue to have your sounds limited during your replays.  Usually, sound issues can be caused by driver issues or bad game files that need a repair.  Just in case, it wouldn't hurt to download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform that repair.

There could also be an issue with your settings specifically for replays.  A config reset might be able to help with that:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if those steps help!
